j = int(raw_input())
while (j > 0):
    i = int(raw_input())
    if (i <= 6):
        print 2
    elif (i>6 and i<=75):
        print 3
    elif (i>75 and i <= 480):
        print 4
    elif (i>480 and i <= 2205):
        print 5
    elif (i > 2205 and i<= 8232):
        print 6
    elif (i > 8232 and i <= 26544):
        print 7
    else:
        print 8
    j = j-1
